html:
Seashore full of wrecks
Under full moon
Next to the wrecks
A farmer grows his food
He's not scared
Of howling in the nights
He does not belive
In monsters and ghosts
But on the sea shore
There are monsters and ghosts
And every night
They loudly howl
His refuge is
Coal and a flask
Sometimes rain drops
Sometime a pig dies
title: Seashore
